/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft glow of streetlights. Cars and bicycles, parked neatly along the side of the road, add to the urban charm of the scene. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a muted palette of grays and browns over the cityscape. Despite the absence of vibrant colors, the image exudes a sense of calm and tranquility, characteristic of a typical evening in Beijing.
